title: Calories in a Jr Whopper
meta_description: Discover calories in jr whopper, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard Burger King Jr Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, pickles, onions, ketchup, mayonnaise; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, ingredients, and customizations. Check Burger King app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A Jr Whopper provides ~310 kcal with 15 g protein and 28 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Jr Whopper?
faqs.a: Approximately 310 kcal for a standard Jr Whopper.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Jr Whopper?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein from the beef patty.

faqs.q: Does a Jr Whopper have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 580 mg due to seasonings and condiments.

faqs.q: Calories in Jr Whopper vs regular Whopper?
faqs.a: Jr Whopper has 310 kcal; regular Whopper has about 670 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Jr Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, 28 g mostly from the bun, with 1 g fiber.
